page.title: 12RECENT LOCAL EVENTS
page.content: IN {JAN 1985}A 1947 MOTOR ASSISTED TANDAM FETCHED Â£260 AT A W_U_E AUCTION. IN{MARCH}K.L.B.S. CLOSED FOR HALF A DAY BECAUSE OF A TEACHERS' STRIKE. IN{APRIL}RENISHAW,THE HIGH_TECH COMPANY BASED AT NEW MILLS RECEIVED ITS 4TH QUEEN'S AWARD. A WOTTON CHILD WAS RUSHED TO HOSPITAL AFTER CONTRACTING MENINGITIS. THE LARGE NUMBER OF LOCAL CASES IS CAUSING GREAT CONCERN. IN{MAY}DR CORDWELL GAINED AN ALLIANCE VICTORY IN THE C.C. ELECTIONS. SHEPPARD ADKINS ENGINEERING (CHARFIELD) WON A Â£250,000 CONTRACT TO RESTORE THE WROUGHT IRON STRUCTURE ON CLEVEDON PIER. A FIRE AT A HOUSE AT THE CLOUD, W_U_E, CAUSED THE DEATH OF AN ELDERLY MAN. IN{JUNE}A WOTTON YOUTH TOLD DURSLEY MAGISTRATES THAT HE DID NOT HAVE L PLATES ON HIS MOPED BECAUS HIS PET DOG HAD CHEWED THEM OFF. HE WAS FINED Â£15.
